chapter.title: Handling Developer Account Creation Requests in Production Mode
chapter.para: When developers try to move their applications into a Production environment, they need to request a new account for the Production environment. These requests can only be approved by &PRODUCTABBR; operators.
To approve/reject a developer account request:

step.para: Click Approve Account. The Authorize Developer Account page displays:
The Authorize Developer Account page displays a listing of developer accounts and the associated statuses. For an account with a status of pending, click Approve or Reject.

chapter.para: If you approve the account, the developer will receive an email notifying him or her of the approval. The developer can then begin using the account.
The Authorize Developer Account page also includes the ability to disable an account once it has been approved.
Added a chapter on approving developer accounts in Production. (Part of DE1503).
